q: ,`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!'' Mr Eric Schmidt has been Google's chief executive since July 2001, when he took over the role from Mr Page. Mr Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and new products, the company said. Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.

Ben Smith: Mike Pence 's mom says he'll announce plans tomorrow Indiana Rep. Mike Pence 's mother tells the National Journal that he'll announce a decision on his his political future tomorrow: Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., is set to announce a decision on his political future on Friday, according to his mother, who has been urging him to finally put an end to all of the building speculation over his political future. `` He will be making his announcement tomorrow,'' said Nancy Mike Pence Fritsch, contacted today by telephone at her home in Columbus, Ind. Iowans play a vital role in hosting the first-in-the-nation presidential caucus, and it is our privilege to offer this Presidential Lecture Series in order to provide our very influential base an opportunity to gain insight into our political process, said Bob Vander Plaats , president and CEO of The FAMiLY LEADER.`` Our base is serious about its role in the political process and the Presidential Lecture Series is a focused strategy to facilitate meaningful exposure to our constituents.
